verbs.description: Trump [V: has] targeted the Cuban tourist industry with new sanctions — however , in the past Cuba was a potential site for a Trump hotel and golf course .
[ARG0: Trump] has [V: targeted] [ARG1: the Cuban tourist industry] [ARG2: with new sanctions] — however , in the past Cuba was a potential site for a Trump hotel and golf course .
Trump has targeted the Cuban tourist industry with new sanctions — [ARGM-ADV: however] , [ARGM-TMP: in the past] [ARG1: Cuba] [V: was] [ARG2: a potential site for a Trump hotel and golf course] .
